0.text: Innate: Whenever Viego scores an enemy champion  takedown while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them, a Mist Wraith spawns from that champion's corpse for 8 seconds. Viego can basic attack a Mist Wraith to consume it: causing him to  blink to its location after winding up for 1 second, during which he is  untargetable (except to  turrets) and  unable to act. He then gains Possession and  heals himself for 2% (+ 2.5% per 100 bonus AD) (+ 2% per 100 AP) (+ 5% per 100% bonus attack speed) of the target's maximum health.
0.html: Innate: Whenever Viego scores an enemy champion takedown while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them, a Mist Wraith spawns from that champion's corpse for 8 seconds. Viego can basic attack a Mist Wraith to consume it: causing him to blink to its location after winding up for 1 second, during which he is untargetable (except to turrets) and unable to act. He then gains Possession and heals himself for 2% (+ 2.5% per 100 bonus AD) (+ 2% per 100 AP) (+ 5% per 100% bonus attack speed) of the target's maximum health.
markedPassages: takedown
blink
untargetable
turrets
unable to act
heals

1.text: Possession: For 10 seconds, Viego assumes the enemy champion's form and gains their basic attacks, basic abilities, items, and base stats (based on Viego's level). He also gains a free cast of  Heartbreaker, which is initially placed on a  1.5-second cooldown, and  10% bonus movement speed while facing enemy champions within 2500 units.
1.html: Possession: For 10 seconds, Viego assumes the enemy champion's form and gains their basic attacks, basic abilities, items, and base stats (based on Viego's level). He also gains a free cast of Heartbreaker, which is initially placed on a  1.5-second cooldown, and  10% bonus movement speed while facing enemy champions within 2500 units.
markedPassages: Heartbreaker
1.5-second
10% bonus movement speed

2.text: Viego cannot use item actives, consumable items, nor the shop during Possession. Casting  Heartbreaker or attacking a Mist Wraith ends Possession immediately.
2.html: Viego cannot use item actives, consumable items, nor the shop during Possession. Casting Heartbreaker or attacking a Mist Wraith ends Possession immediately.
markedPassages: Heartbreaker

3.text: Viego will preserve his current health percentage between transformations.
3.html: Viego will preserve his current health percentage between transformations.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Viego will preserve his current health percentage between transformations.

0.text: Passive: Viego's basic attacks are empowered to deal bonus physical damage  on-hit, which has a minimum threshold and is capped at 80 against  monsters.
0.html: Passive: Viego's basic attacks are empowered to deal bonus physical damage on-hit, which has a minimum threshold and is capped at 80 against monsters.
markedPassages: on-hit
monsters

1.text: Additionally, his damaging abilities apply a mark to enemies hit for 4 seconds. Viego's next basic attack against a marked target is empowered to consume the mark  on-hit to strike a second time, dealing 20% AD (+ 15% AP) physical damage and  healing him for 135% of the post-mitigation damage dealt, increased to 145% against monsters and reduced to 10% against  minions.
1.html: Additionally, his damaging abilities apply a mark to enemies hit for 4 seconds. Viego's next basic attack against a marked target is empowered to consume the mark on-hit to strike a second time, dealing 20% AD (+ 15% AP) physical damage and healing him for 135% of the post-mitigation damage dealt, increased to 145% against monsters and reduced to 10% against minions.
markedPassages: on-hit
20% AD (+ 15% AP)
healing
minions

2.text: The second strike can  critically strike for 35% (+  7%) AD (+ 26.25% (+ 5.25%) AP) physical damage and applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
2.html: The second strike can critically strike for 35% (+  7%) AD (+ 26.25% (+ 5.25%) AP) physical damage and applies on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
markedPassages: critically strike
35% (+  7%) AD
(+ 26.25% (+ 5.25%) AP)
on-hit

3.text: Active: Viego stabs in a line in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit, increased by 0% − 100% (based on critical strike chance), and 20 bonus physical damage against monsters.
3.html: Active: Viego stabs in a line in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit, increased by 0% − 100% (based on critical strike chance), and 20 bonus physical damage against monsters.
markedPassages: 0% − 100% (based on critical strike chance)
(1 + (100% +  0%) critical strike chance)
0%
(1 + (100% +  0%) critical strike chance)
0%

4.text: Blade of the Ruined King's passive remains under  Possession, and while transformed, the second strike is instead converted to bonus damage on-hit which no longer applies on-hit effects but can still  critically strike (based on possessed stats).
4.html: Blade of the Ruined King's passive remains under Possession, and while transformed, the second strike is instead converted to bonus damage on-hit which no longer applies on-hit effects but can still critically strike (based on possessed stats).

critically strike

, and while transformed, the second strike is instead converted to bonus damage on-hit which no longer applies on-hit effects but can still  critically strike (based on possessed stats).

0.text: Active: Viego  charges while being  slowed by 10% for up to 3 seconds to increase Spectral Maw's missile range and  stun duration over the first second of the channel.
0.html: Active: Viego charges while being slowed by 10% for up to 3 seconds to increase Spectral Maw's missile range and stun duration over the first second of the channel.
markedPassages: charges
slowed
stun

1.text: Spectral Maw can be recast within the duration. If the charge completes without reactivation, Spectral Maw is cancelled and placed on  full cooldown. If the charge is  interrupted, it will be placed on a 3-second cooldown.
1.html: Spectral Maw can be recast within the duration. If the charge completes without reactivation, Spectral Maw is cancelled and placed on  full cooldown. If the charge is interrupted, it will be placed on a 3-second cooldown.
markedPassages: full cooldown
interrupted

2.text: Recast: Viego hurls a blast of mist in the target direction and  dashes a fixed distance in the same direction, though not through terrain. The mist deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  stuns them for 0.25 − 1.25 (based on channel time) seconds.
2.html: Recast: Viego hurls a blast of mist in the target direction and dashes a fixed distance in the same direction, though not through terrain. The mist deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and stuns them for 0.25 − 1.25 (based on channel time) seconds.
markedPassages: dashes
stuns

3.text: Spectral Maw  resets Viego's basic attack timer. Viego can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
3.html: Spectral Maw resets Viego's basic attack timer. Viego can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Spectral Maw  resets Viego's basic attack timer. Viego can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

0.text: Active: Viego sends a spectre in the target direction that creates a trail of mist in its wake which lasts 8 seconds. If it hits terrain, the mist will spread further around either side.
0.html: Active: Viego sends a spectre in the target direction that creates a trail of mist in its wake which lasts 8 seconds. If it hits terrain, the mist will spread further around either side.

1.text: While inside the mist, Viego gains  bonus attack speed. If he does not attack or cast abilities, he also gains  bonus movement speed and  camouflage.
1.html: While inside the mist, Viego gains  bonus attack speed. If he does not attack or cast abilities, he also gains  bonus movement speed and camouflage.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed
bonus movement speed
camouflage

2.text: Declaring a basic attack or casting an ability will break the camouflage and remove the bonus movement speed, preventing Viego from gaining them again for 1 second, reduced to 0.6 seconds if he recasted  Spectral Maw and increased to 2 seconds if he attacked a  monster. This duration refreshes on subsequent attacks and ability casts.
2.html: Declaring a basic attack or casting an ability will break the camouflage and remove the bonus movement speed, preventing Viego from gaining them again for 1 second, reduced to 0.6 seconds if he recasted Spectral Maw and increased to 2 seconds if he attacked a monster. This duration refreshes on subsequent attacks and ability casts.
markedPassages: Spectral Maw
monster

3.text: Harrowed Path can be cast during any of Viego's abilities. He cannot gain the camouflage nor bonus movement speed from Harrowed Path for 0.75 seconds after starting the channel of  Spectral Maw, recasting ends this duration prematurely.
3.html: Harrowed Path can be cast during any of Viego's abilities. He cannot gain the camouflage nor bonus movement speed from Harrowed Path for 0.75 seconds after starting the channel of Spectral Maw, recasting ends this duration prematurely.
markedPassages: Spectral Maw

0.text: Active: Viego gains  displacement immunity over the cast time, then  blinks to the target location. Upon arrival, he strikes the most wounded enemy champion nearby, dealing physical damage,  slowing them by 99% for 0.25 seconds, and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness. Other nearby enemies are  knocked back up to 400-units away based on proximity, though not through terrain.
0.html: Active: Viego gains displacement immunity over the cast time, then blinks to the target location. Upon arrival, he strikes the most wounded enemy champion nearby, dealing physical damage, slowing them by 99% for 0.25 seconds, and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness. Other nearby enemies are knocked back up to 400-units away based on proximity, though not through terrain.

Active: Viego stabs in a line in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit, increased by 0% − 100% (based on critical strike chance), and 20 bonus physical damage against monsters.

textContent.text: Blade of the Ruined King's passive remains under  Possession, and while transformed, the second strike is instead converted to bonus damage on-hit which no longer applies on-hit effects but can still  critically strike (based on possessed stats).
textContent.html: Blade of the Ruined King's passive remains under Possession, and while transformed, the second strike is instead converted to bonus damage on-hit which no longer applies on-hit effects but can still critically strike (based on possessed stats).

, and while transformed, the second strike is instead converted to bonus damage on-hit which no longer applies on-hit effects but can still critically strike (based on possessed stats).

textContent.text: Active: Viego  charges while being  slowed by 10% for up to 3 seconds to increase Spectral Maw's missile range and  stun duration over the first second of the channel.
textContent.html: Active: Viego charges while being slowed by 10% for up to 3 seconds to increase Spectral Maw's missile range and stun duration over the first second of the channel.

textContent.text: Spectral Maw can be recast within the duration. If the charge completes without reactivation, Spectral Maw is cancelled and placed on  full cooldown. If the charge is  interrupted, it will be placed on a 3-second cooldown.
textContent.html: Spectral Maw can be recast within the duration. If the charge completes without reactivation, Spectral Maw is cancelled and placed on  full cooldown. If the charge is interrupted, it will be placed on a 3-second cooldown.

textContent.text: Recast: Viego hurls a blast of mist in the target direction and  dashes a fixed distance in the same direction, though not through terrain. The mist deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  stuns them for 0.25 − 1.25 (based on channel time) seconds.
textContent.html: Recast: Viego hurls a blast of mist in the target direction and dashes a fixed distance in the same direction, though not through terrain. The mist deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and stuns them for 0.25 − 1.25 (based on channel time) seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Recast: Viego hurls a blast of mist in the target direction and  dashes a fixed distance in the same direction, though not through terrain. The mist deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  stuns them for 0.25 − 1.25 (based on channel time) seconds.

textContent.text: Spectral Maw  resets Viego's basic attack timer. Viego can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
textContent.html: Spectral Maw resets Viego's basic attack timer. Viego can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Spectral Maw  resets Viego's basic attack timer. Viego can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

concerningSkills.skillName: spectral maw resets viego's basic attack timer. viego can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

textContent.text: Active: Viego sends a spectre in the target direction that creates a trail of mist in its wake which lasts 8 seconds. If it hits terrain, the mist will spread further around either side.
textContent.html: Active: Viego sends a spectre in the target direction that creates a trail of mist in its wake which lasts 8 seconds. If it hits terrain, the mist will spread further around either side.

textContent.text: While inside the mist, Viego gains  bonus attack speed. If he does not attack or cast abilities, he also gains  bonus movement speed and  camouflage.
textContent.html: While inside the mist, Viego gains  bonus attack speed. If he does not attack or cast abilities, he also gains  bonus movement speed and camouflage.

skillTabs.concerningText: While inside the mist, Viego gains  bonus attack speed. If he does not attack or cast abilities, he also gains  bonus movement speed and  camouflage.
While inside the mist, Viego gains  bonus attack speed. If he does not attack or cast abilities, he also gains  bonus movement speed and  camouflage.

textContent.text: Declaring a basic attack or casting an ability will break the camouflage and remove the bonus movement speed, preventing Viego from gaining them again for 1 second, reduced to 0.6 seconds if he recasted  Spectral Maw and increased to 2 seconds if he attacked a  monster. This duration refreshes on subsequent attacks and ability casts.
textContent.html: Declaring a basic attack or casting an ability will break the camouflage and remove the bonus movement speed, preventing Viego from gaining them again for 1 second, reduced to 0.6 seconds if he recasted Spectral Maw and increased to 2 seconds if he attacked a monster. This duration refreshes on subsequent attacks and ability casts.

textContent.text: Harrowed Path can be cast during any of Viego's abilities. He cannot gain the camouflage nor bonus movement speed from Harrowed Path for 0.75 seconds after starting the channel of  Spectral Maw, recasting ends this duration prematurely.
textContent.html: Harrowed Path can be cast during any of Viego's abilities. He cannot gain the camouflage nor bonus movement speed from Harrowed Path for 0.75 seconds after starting the channel of Spectral Maw, recasting ends this duration prematurely.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Harrowed Path can be cast during any of Viego's abilities. He cannot gain the camouflage nor bonus movement speed from Harrowed Path for 0.75 seconds after starting the channel of  Spectral Maw, recasting ends this duration prematurely.

concerningSkills.skillName: harrowed path can be cast during any of viego's abilities. he cannot gain the camouflage nor bonus movement speed from harrowed path for 0.75 seconds after starting the channel of spectral maw, recasting ends this duration prematurely.

textContent.text: Active: Viego gains  displacement immunity over the cast time, then  blinks to the target location. Upon arrival, he strikes the most wounded enemy champion nearby, dealing physical damage,  slowing them by 99% for 0.25 seconds, and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness. Other nearby enemies are  knocked back up to 400-units away based on proximity, though not through terrain.
textContent.html: Active: Viego gains displacement immunity over the cast time, then blinks to the target location. Upon arrival, he strikes the most wounded enemy champion nearby, dealing physical damage, slowing them by 99% for 0.25 seconds, and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness. Other nearby enemies are knocked back up to 400-units away based on proximity, though not through terrain.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Viego gains  displacement immunity over the cast time, then  blinks to the target location. Other nearby enemies are  knocked back up to 400-units away based on proximity, though not through terrain.

markedPassages: 12 / 16 / 20% (+ 3% per 100 bonus AD) of target's missing health

textContent.text: All targets hit are dealt 120% AD physical damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on critical strike chance).
textContent.html: All targets hit are dealt 120% AD physical damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on critical strike chance).

textContent.text: If a  Possession is discarded, Heartbreaker will be placed on a  1.5-second cooldown if it is not already on cooldown. Heartbreaker will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+8% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit equal to ( 12% / 9%) of the target's current health, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.
Unique – Siphon: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 40 − 103 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you 25% bonus movement speed for the same duration (30 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MIST'S EDGE: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit equal to ( 12% /  9%) of the target's current health, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  525

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+300 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 125% base AD (+ ( 6% / 3%) of target's maximum health) as bonus physical damage on-hit, for a minimum of 150% base AD and a maximum of 250% base AD against monsters. If the target is a champion, heal for 68.75% base AD (+ ( 3.3% / 1.65%) of target's maximum health) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 3% armor penetration and 3% magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 125% base AD (+ ( 6% /  3%) of target's maximum health) as bonus physical damage on-hit, for a minimum of 150% base AD and a maximum of 250% base AD against monsters. If the target is a champion,  heal for 68.75% base AD (+ ( 3.3% /  1.65%) of target's maximum health) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 attack damage
+50 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage and heals you for 50% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on  shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

+40 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 attack damage
+50 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs ( 200 / 150) (+ ( 225% / 168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).
Unique: Triggering Lifeline also grants 12% life steal for 5 seconds. After 2 seconds into the duration, taking or dealing damage refreshes this effect to 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs ( 200 /  150) (+ ( 225% /  168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).
